Package tuitions

Class International

java.lang.Object
tuitions.Student
tuitions.NonResident
tuitions.International
public class International extends NonResident
The International subclass that extends from the NonResident superclass. Use this class to do get calculation information for international students.
Author:
Tommy Cho

    • International

      public International(String name, String major, int creditHours, boolean studyAbroad)
      /** Parameterized constructor for an international student that calls the super constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the student in string form
      major - Major of the student in string form
      creditHours - Credit hours the student is taking in int form
      studyAbroad - True if they are study abroad, false otherwise

  • Method Details

    • setStudyAbroad

      public void setStudyAbroad()
      Setter method for study abroad status This only sets it to true because the project description doesn't say a student can go from study-abroad to non study-abroad.

    • studyAbroadString

      private String studyAbroadString()
      A helper method that returns whether a student is study abroad status or not in string form
      Returns:
      "study abroad" if they are study abroad, nothing otherwise
